name: SIMPWALK
description:
Dedicated for Kureiji Ollie, Pavolia Reine and Anya Melfissa from Hololive Indonesia, 2nd Generation; this is a 100% free, short 2D sidescrolling, platformer, maze, coin-collecting game.

In SIMPWALK, you will play throughout 3 stages, each using Udin / Mr. Akyat / Toaster-kun on their own stages. These characters are the known 3 mascot figures of the girls. There won't be any spikes or enemy encounter, just you, a maze, coins to collect, and yagoo(?!).

Gameplay length: around 15 minutes

※ This game works only on Windows.

SIMPWALK's production team wishes for Hololive Indonesia 2nd generation for another successful years of careers and everything. 🎉💖
